channel.title: cake on Cloudberry
channel.description: Recent content in cake on Cloudberry

item.title: Fudge
item.description: One bowl yellow cake recipe by Melissa Clark of New York Times Ingredients 3 eggs, room temperature or warmed in a bowl of water for 15 minutes 60g butter, melted and cooled 1 cup sugar 120ml oil 240 ml buttermilk or thinned yoghurt 2 tsp vanilla 1/2 tsp salt 1/2 tsp baking soda 2 tsp baking powder 255g flour Preheat oven to 180 celsius Whisk eggs furiously and until frothy ~ 1 minute Whisk in butter, then oil Then buttermilk Add vanilla Whisk in salt, baking soda and baking powder Whisk in flour - whisk vigourously for 30 seconds to remove lumps

item.title: Kiev Cake
item.description: This cake is a mission to make, with many steps, but, after making it, everyone agreed it was worth the effort. Th eoriginal was a bit sweet for me, so next time I want to use some adjustments to get the sugar content down a notch. Kiev cake Adapted from Let the Baking Begin Ingredients Kiev cake 1 recipe Yellow cake 1 recipe Russian buttercream 0.5 recipe meringue cookies 1 cup chopped roasted hazelnuts 1/2 cup roasted, canned or frozen cherries
